Tweaks.name: Tweaked Gravel
Tweaks.description: Changes the Gravel texture to make it grainier.

Tweaks.name: Classic Gravel
Tweaks.description: Changes the Gravel texture to the classic one.

Tweaks.name: Brown Podzol
Tweaks.description: Changes the Podzol texture to remove the greenish specs in it.

Tweaks.name: Faceless Pumpkins
Tweaks.description: Exchanges the Pumpkin's face texture with its side texture to rid the standard Pumpkins of their faces.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Horse Armor
Tweaks.description: Changes the Iron and Diamond Horse Armor to be consistent with their item versions. Iron Horse Armor will get a black saddle and Diamond Horse Armor will get a blue saddle.

Tweaks.name: Blinking Ender Eye
Tweaks.description: Gives the Ender Eye an animation that has it blinking from time to time.

Tweaks.name: Mixed Hurt Sounds
Tweaks.description:
Mixes the Hurting sounds for the player with the old Beta sound so that they play at the same time when a player gets hurt. This also applies to the new specific Hurting sounds that play when the player is hurt by Sweet Berry Bushes, Drowning or Fire.

requiresefr

⚠️ Careful: Some mods assign the standard player Hurting sound to mobs. Using this Addon will give them the classic Hurting sound aswell, so keep that in mind.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Wheat
Tweaks.description: Makes the Wheat texture consistent with the color palette of Hay Bales.

Tweaks.name: Useful Chainmail
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of all Chainmail pieces so that they look a little more tangible.

requiresefr

attscript

Tweaks.name: Consistent Helmets
Tweaks.description:
Provides a noseguard in the item textures of Iron Helmets, Gold Helmets and Diamond Helmets.

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Blinking Observers
Tweaks.description:
Gives the Observer face an animation that has it blinking and shifting eyes from time to time.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Blooming Cactus
Tweaks.description:
Adds blooming blossoms to the side and top of the Cactus texture.

incompat{Cactus Complete Pack}

Tweaks.name: Beta Cow Sounds
Tweaks.description:
Changes all sounds Cows make into those of Minecraft Beta.

⚠️ Careful: Should a mod add another type of cow that utilizes vanilla cows as a basis, they will also emit the sounds from this Addon.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Iron Nugget
Tweaks.description:
Changes the texture of the Iron Nugget, to fit the lineart of the Gold Nugget and the color palette of the Iron Ingot.

requiresefr

Tweaks.name: Black Granite
Tweaks.description:
Changes the Granite texture to turn it into deep black with white specs.

requiresefr

inspiration{[Redrooey](https://www.planetminecraft.com/texture-pack/black-granite/)}

Tweaks.name: Pebble-free Dirt
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of all dirt variations so that they have no pebbles in them.

requiresefr

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Illager Witch
Tweaks.description: Changes the color scheme of the Witch to be more in line with how the Illagers from the Village & Pillage Update look.

Tweaks.name: Consistent Leather
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures of Leather, Saddles, Item Frames (both in item and entity/block form) and Books to have the color palette of Leather Armor.

inspirationvt

Tweaks.name: Desert Shulkers
Tweaks.description:
Changes the textures for Shulkers when placed in Desert or Mesa biomes. The texture is a palette swap of the __Fixed Shulkers Addon__, that uses the color palette of Red Sandstone.

requiresefr

inspiration{[Whimzee](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8qKTXf_-obk)}

Tweaks.name: Faded Classic Command Block
Tweaks.description: Changes the texture of the old Command Block to be faded with lowly blinking lights. It is recommended to only use this Addon in conjunction with [Future Commands](https://www.minecraftforum.net/forums/mapping-and-modding-java-edition/minecraft-mods/2888753-moved-to-a-new-website-future-commands-v1-3). Also renames the Command Block to 'Classic Command Block'.
